attributes.action: Mandatory dog breeder/owner licence with compulsory dog training
attributes.additional_details: For the future safety of children and adults and ti ensure dog owners are educated about the needs of a dog
attributes.background: To enforce the licencing of dog breeders with regular checks. Also a licence for owners with compulsory dog training.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

People already need a licence if they run a business that breeds and advertises dogs for sale, or breed 3 or more litters in any 12 month period and sell any of the puppies. We can accept a petition calling for changes to licensing arrangements for dog breeders, but it would need to be clear what changes you want.

We could accept a petition calling for mandatory training and licences for dog owners. We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Make licenses and third party insurance compulsory for dog owners: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/624520
